QuestData.Title: Freeing Mind and Body
QuestData.Description: Mogu stealing peoples minds! Making them do evil things.$B$BDon't kill them, just kill the mogu, then they forget about all the mogu mind stealing and stop being evil. You should fix people like Rook is.
QuestData.LogDescription: Free 6 Dominated Guards by killing their controllers.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Rook Stonetoe at Mistfall Village in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
